project_plan.name: Random Password Generator
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates random passwords with configurable settings for length and character types.

task.name: Implement password generation logic that includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Allow user to configure the length of the password through input.
Handle edge cases, such as invalid length input and ensure the output meets the specified criteria.
Write tests for the password generator to ensure it meets specifications (e.g., length, character type inclusion).
Execute tests on the password generator to validate its functionality.
